languages.text: "Я уже почти было собрался в отставку, сестра... но куда ж Лорд-капитан без меня, а? Нет, рановато еще".
"I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, hmm? No, it is a little too soon for that."
languages.original_text: "Я уже почти было собрался в отставку, сестра... но куда ж Лорд-капитан без меня, а? Нет, рановато еще".

traits.locale_text: "I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, eh? No, it is a little too soon for that."
"I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, eh? No, it is a little too soon for that."
"I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, eh? No, it is a little too soon for that."
"I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, eh? No, it is a little too soon for that."

languages.text: “我差点就挺不住了，修女……可如果没有我，舰长大人该怎么办？不行，现在倒下还为时过早。”
languages.original_text: "I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, hmm? No, it is a little too soon for that."

traits.locale_text: “我差点就挺不住了，修女……可如果没有我，舰长大人该怎么办？不行，现在倒下还为时过早。”
“我差点就挺不住了，修女……可如果没有我，舰长大人该怎么办？不行，现在倒下还为时过早。”

languages.text: « J'étais sur le point de prendre ma retraite, ma sœur, mais... que ferait {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} sans moi, hein ? Non, il est encore trop tôt pour ça. »
languages.original_text: "I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, hmm? No, it is a little too soon for that."

traits.locale_text: « J'étais sur le point de prendre ma retraite, ma sœur, mais... que ferait {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} sans moi, hein ? Non, il est encore trop tôt pour ça. »

languages.text: «Pues estaba pensando en jubilarme, hermana... pero ¿qué sería de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán sin mí? ¿Mmm? No, es pronto para eso».
languages.original_text: "I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, hmm? No, it is a little too soon for that."

traits.locale_text: «Pues estaba pensando en jubilarme, hermana... pero ¿qué sería de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán sin mí? ¿Mmm? No, es pronto para eso».

languages.text: 「間もなく引退というところでした、シスター…私なくしてロード・キャプテンはどこに行くというのでしょう？まだ退くわけにはいかないということです」
languages.original_text: "I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, hmm? No, it is a little too soon for that."

traits.locale_text: 「間もなく引退というところでした、シスター…私なくしてロード・キャプテンはどこに行くというのでしょう？まだ退くわけにはいかないということです」
「間もなく引退というところでした、シスター…私なくしてロード・キャプテンはどこに行くというのでしょう？まだ退くわけにはいかないということです」

languages.text: "Ich war kurz davor, in Pension zu gehen, Schwester ... doch was würde der Lord Captain ohne mich tun, hm? Nein, dafür ist es noch ein wenig zu früh."
languages.original_text: "I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, hmm? No, it is a little too soon for that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war kurz davor, in Pension zu gehen, Schwester ... doch was würde der Lord Captain ohne mich tun, hm? Nein, dafür ist es noch ein wenig zu früh."

languages.original_text: "I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, eh? No, it is a little too soon for that."

languages.text: "Emekli olmaya niyetliydim Rahibe... Fakat ben olmasam Lord Kaptan'ın hâli ne olur? Hayır, daha erken."
languages.original_text: "I was on the verge of retiring, Sister... but where would the Lord Captain be without me, hmm? No, it is a little too soon for that."
